attributes.review: Wow so odd that when I tried using this app I was bombarded with so much hate and inhumanity... I wonder if the app could possibly reflect the person it represents? Hm.. not sure. Anyways, BIDEN2020
attributes.title: Malfunctioning

attributes.review: i download it to see if it could change my perspective on trump but IT MADE IT WORSE. worse app ever do not download!!! my name is karen and not even I was satisfied with this
attributes.title: disgusting

attributes.review: Took years to download 🙂Loved how it froze my phone 🥰I liked the feature where it locks your phone for 2hr🥳.  10/10 app
attributes.title: Trash app

attributes.review: The app itself is very messy and organized. You would think from a “great” president they could at least hire better app developers 🤷🏼‍♀️
attributes.title: Messy and Unorganized

attributes.review: I downloaded this app, which took 12 hrs btw. Then I got a virus. If I could rate the app a -1 star a would. They don’t even deserve a star
attributes.title: I want compensation for wasting my time

attributes.review: This app took 6 hours to download. My phone became super slow. The app has so many glitches. It does not run well at all.
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: horrible quality and graphics, it’s like America is back in the 1800s. 0/10 would recommend.
attributes.title: useless app

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and as soon as I opened it, my phone exploded. I had to buy a new phone and I’m writing this review to share the experience with the community!
attributes.title: I CANT BELIEVE THIS

attributes.review: i HATE this app like it literally took 20 hours to download and it kept on lagging like so bad. i cant believe trump would have an app this bad but what else could you expect from a talking orange...👁👄👁 ANYWAYS STREAM “STAY GOLD” by BTS😗
attributes.title: 🧚🏽‍♀️✨🦋THE WORST APP EVER🌸⚡️🧚🏽‍♀️

attributes.review: This app hardly works, constantly crashes, not to mention the content on it isn’t worth a download.
attributes.title: Worst app on the store
